channel.title: Three Angry Heroes Brandishing Weapons
channel.description:
Back when G+ was the place for role playing discussion, there was a circle dedicated to posting trope-y RPG covers that featured “three angry heroes brandishing weapons”, such as (possibly) the [ur-example](https://www.enworld.org/attachments/starfrontiers-alphadawnbluebox1-jpg.111259/). Does anyone…
1. …remember who ran that circle? 1. …know if it is still running in some form now? 1. …have an archive of it anywhere?
